description: Tomosaka Suzuka is http://anidb.net/ch5077 [Kenji]`s younger sister (by one year). For lack of a mother she is the pillar of the Tomosaka household albeit her cooking skills have room for improvement; her favorite food is spaghetti with tomato sauce and lemon tea. She has a gentle, lively and innocent disposition; she is member of the Judo club (with http://anidb.net/ch30242 [her father] being her sports teacher at school) and practices every morning.
name: Tomosaka Suzuka
